org.xbib.marc.xml

Class MarcXchangeEventConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.marc.xml.MarcXchangeEventConsumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.xml.stream.util.XMLEventConsumer, MarcListener, MarcXchangeConstants

    public class MarcXchangeEventConsumer
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.xml.stream.util.XMLEventConsumer, MarcXchangeConstants, MarcListener
    The MarcXchange event consumer listens to StaX events and converts them to MarcXchange events.
